Make a homemade cleaning solution: One creative solution would be to create your own cleaning solutions using natural ingredients like baking soda, vinegar, lemon juice, and essential oils. These ingredients are effective at cleaning and disinfecting surfaces without the use of harsh chemicals. You can mix different combinations of these ingredients to create a cleaning solution that suits your needs. For example, a solution of equal parts water and white vinegar can be used to clean and disinfect surfaces, while a solution of equal parts water and lemon juice can be used to clean and polish surfaces.

Use ash and mud as a cleaning agent: Another creative solution would be to use ash and mud as a cleaning agent. Ash has natural antibacterial properties, and when mixed with water, it can create a cleaning solution that can be used to clean and disinfect surfaces. Mud, on the other hand, has natural abrasive properties that can help remove dirt and grime from surfaces. By mixing ash and mud with water, you can create a cleaning solution that is effective at cleaning and disinfecting surfaces without the use of harsh chemicals.

Use plant-based cleaning products: Another creative solution would be to use plant-based cleaning products.
